caption.p: SEM images of electrodeposited Mg from the B(OMgCl) 3-based electrolyte in ( a) triglyme and ( b) triglyme-THF on a Pt electrode. ( c) Synchrotron radiation XRD patterns of electrodeposited Mg from the B(OMgCl) 3-based electrolyte in triglyme (black) and triglyme-THF (red) compared with that of reference Mg (gray).
